game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact in the ruins.
game.description: Search through the old ruins to locate the lost artifact and bring it back to quest giver.
game.reward: 100 experience points and a magical amulet

task.description: Locate and enter the entrance to the ancient ruins.
task.location: Ruins of Eldrid, west of the village

task.description: Navigate through the ruins and locate the chamber where the artifact is kept.
task.location: Deep within the Ruins of Eldrid

task.description: Defeat any guardians and retrieve the artifact from its pedestal.
task.location: The Heart of the Ruins, inner sanctum
